segments.text: What's holding us back on the plant expansion project ? We were supposed to see the specs on that ages ago.Why haven't I heard anything about it ? Did the whole project just vanish into thin air ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . The plant expansion project has been delayed.There was a snag up in the fling process to get the necessary construction permits.It seems that the property we were slated to build on is also habitat for some endangered indigenous species .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're joking , right ? No wonder we've been tied up with this project . I know the environmental impact statement will take forever to get approval if they've found anything endangered on the site . Are they positive there is evidence of endangered species actually living there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The environmental review board has a team on it now.Hopefully we'll know more by the end of the week .
segments.speaker: S2
